remarks: The value of the recursive definition generator at a successor (special case where the characteristic function uses the map operation). (Contributed by NM, 22-Oct-2003.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2016.)
statement:
rdgsucmptf.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
rdgsucmptf.2 $e |- F/_ x B $.
rdgsucmptf.3 $e |- F/_ x D $.
rdgsucmptf.4 $e |- F = rec ( ( x e. _V |-> C ) , A ) $.
rdgsucmptf.5 $e |- ( x = ( F ` B ) -> C = D ) $.
rdgsucmptf $p |- ( ( B e. On /\ D e. V ) -> ( F ` suc B ) = D ) $.
